ARCHITECT & INTERIOR DESIGN Sustainability, Consciousness and Innovation

Latest Projects

Step into the design universe of Adela Amandari, where simplicity meets sophistication and spaces are crafted with an artful touch. I specialize in a distinctive blend of modern elegance and timeless functionality, transforming visions into tangible structures that resonate with purpose. Explore the curated collection of my work and witness the fusion of innovation and simplicity, creating environments that stand as testaments to the enduring power of well-crafted design.

A luxurious mountain residence that blends contemporary design with natural surroundings, offering panoramic views and sustainable living.

A revolutionary approach to communal living that combines private spaces with shared amenities, fostering community while maintaining individuality.

A modern library design that serves as a community hub, combining traditional library functions with contemporary social spaces.
